thread.title: WATCH: You have to see this Eagles hype video prior to must-win game vs. Giants
thread.title_full: WATCH: You have to see this Eagles hype video prior to must-win game vs. Giants | NJ.com

author: Eliot Shorr-Parks | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: WATCH: You have to see this Eagles hype video prior to must-win game vs. Giants
text:
The Eagles game against the Giants is getting closer and closer, with fans counting down the minutes until the must-win showdown against a division rival on Monday Night Football.
In case you weren't sufficiently excited, however, the Eagles have released the above video, featuring team legend Brian Dawkins to get you ready.
Enjoy.
THE NO-HUDDLE SHOW, Ep. 11: Finally, a glimpse of what Eagles fans expected There were plenty of encouraging signs in the Eagles' blowout win over the Saints. From Fletcher Cox's dominance to Josh Huff's emergence, the Eagles showed what they're capable of doing. Now the question is: Can they do it again vs. the Giants? Subscribe to the podcast on iTunes or Stitcher .
